Name: Pale Red Crab
Desc: A claw-snapping crab that can be found in various water bodies throughout Teyvat.\nIt has a light red colored shell and a gentle nature. As such, it's a lot more suitable to be raised for ornamental display than others of its kind. \nIt is said that after arriving in the Serenitea Pot, such crabs and the Unagi have since become neighbors.
